episodes.title: Jinger Duggar Vuolo Opens Up to Lecrae About Escaping Cult-Like Religious Upbringing
episodes.description:
We’re sittin’ down with Jinger Duggar Vuolo—yeah, that Jinger from ‘19 Kids and Counting.’ But trust me, her story goes way deeper than anything you saw on TV. She gets real about growing up in a fear-based system under Bill Gothard, the pressure of perfection, and what it’s like to break free while under a cult-like religious system.

Let’s go to the Deep End!
